title: FT/FS: Bender with Trees EPDG SGC 50 - TRADED
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FT/FS: Bender with Trees EPDG SGC 50 - TRADED
posts.post_content:
THRILLED TO SAY HE IS TRADED! ;)

Have this Bender with trees EPDG available. Weird but fun card, kind of a pain to find and he’s the toughest of the Benders.  Pop reports show six PSA 4’s as the highest grade....while SGC has a single 4.5 as its highest graded along with two 4’s including this one. Good get....

Asking $625 via a no fee method of payment. Will consider trades for other HOFer EPDGs that could be upgrades for me. 

Available via PM. Thanks for looking!!!

Jeff
